sentence.Network_en: Blake jumped in expertly; the boat dipped slightly under his weight.
sentence.Network_cn: 布莱克很熟练地跳上了船，他的重量使小船微微向下沉了沉。

sentence.Network_en: Expertly he zigzagged his way across the field, avoiding the deeper gullies.
sentence.Network_cn: 他熟练地左一拐右一拐地绕过深沟，穿过了原野。

sentence.Network_en: Shopkeepers expertly rolled spices up in bay leaves.
sentence.Network_cn: 店主熟练地将调料卷进月桂树叶里。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 名师丁雪明：2010年考研基础词汇备考札记 ... expire v. 期满，失效，专世‖ expertly ad. 熟练地‖ expertness n. 熟练.

list.abs: no country in the world has developed so expertly the skill of advertising as the Americans .世界上没有一个国家像美国那样能如此专门地发展了广告术。
good knowledge of drawings and tolerance and can use the normal gauges expertly .有较好的图纸和公差知识，熟悉常用量具的使用。
The worker operated the machine expertly ; we admired him greatly ., 那位工人操纵机器很熟练 , 我们对他很钦佩.
While Molly and Jack wipe hands the waitress expertly tidy up the table ., 趁茉莉和杰克擦拭手臂的时候 , 女服务生麻利地摆好桌子.

entry.def: An expert is a person who is very skilled at doing something or who knows a lot about a particular subject.

example.ex: Our team of experts will be on hand to offer help and advice between 12 noon and 7pm daily.
example.tran: 每天中午12点到下午7点，我们的专家小组将随时提供帮助和建议。

entry.tran: 技术娴熟的;熟练的;在行的
entry.def: Someone who is expert at doing something is very skilled at it.

example.ex: The Japanese are expert at lowering manufacturing costs...
example.tran: 日本人在降低制造成本方面很在行。

example.ex: There is a great deal to learn from Hal's expert approach.
example.tran: 从哈尔熟练的方法中可以学到很多。

entry.def: If you say that someone has expert hands or an expert eye, you mean that they are very skilful or experienced in using their hands or eyes for a particular purpose.

example.ex: When the horse suffered a back injury Harvey cured it with his own expert hands...
example.tran: 那匹马背部受伤后，哈维用他内行的双手把它治好了。

example.ex: The symptoms are very mild and it takes an expert eye to see them.
example.tran: 症状非常轻，要靠专家的眼睛才能看出来。

entry.def: Expert advice or help is given by someone who has studied a subject thoroughly or who is very skilled at a particular job.

example.ex: You'll also get expert advice on keeping your hair in good condition...
example.tran: 你还会获得有关如何保持良好发质的专家建议。
我们需要听听专家的意见。

sentences.en: He tensed himself for the jump and landed expertly on the other side.
sentences.cn: 他绷紧身体跳起，然后娴熟地落在另一边。

sentences.en: The worker operated the machine expertly;we admired him greatly.
sentences.cn: 那位工人操纵机器很熟练,我们对他很钦佩。
